speaker: Heart-stone
lines: You feel fine seams in the heart-stone under your fingers.
The face shifts; a hidden cache comes free.
Mica grains spill across your palm.
The relics are heavy and well-balanced.
You choose one to carry down the mountain.

give_item.name: Aegis Spear
give_item.description: A mountain-forged spear weighted against giants

give_item.name: Windcloak
give_item.description: A cloak that sheds arrows like sleet

give_item.name: Avalanche Sigil
give_item.description: Call white thunder from the slopes
